sa darpapuurN.o na samiikshhase tawama; anarthama aatmanya api wartamaanama

aha.m hi wa.h pashyataa.m dawiipama ena.m; rathaada bhiishhma.m paatayitaasmi baaNai.h
shaw.obhuute katthanaa waakya.m wijJNaasyati suy.odhana.h
